SEARCH
Module net.cnoga.paint
Package net.cnoga.paint.core.workspace

Class UndoRedoCapability

java.lang.Object
net.cnoga.paint.core.bus.EventBusPublisher
net.cnoga.paint.core.workspace.UndoRedoCapability
public class UndoRedoCapability extends EventBusPublisher
Manages undo/redo functionality for a workspace.

Captures snapshots of the base layer and maintains undo/redo stacks. Listens to SaveStateRequest, UndoRequest, and RedoRequest events.
